long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HawkLink provides quick and easy access to Laurier websites!

This chrome extension allows Laurier students to easily gain access to important Laurier affiliated websites with the click of a button, without having to open a new tab, and search up a website over and over again.

Websites Linked:

MyLearningSpace
LORIS
Laurier Athletics
Laurier Website
Campus Ebookstore
Outlook
Tophat
Laurier Bookstore
Laurier Undergraduate Academic Calendar
Laurier GPA Calculator
